body.name: Glade PlugIns Refills Air Freshener, Scented and Essential Oils for Home and Bathroom, Aqua Waves, 3.35 Fl Oz, 5 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 59 mins
features: Decorate the air with our Glade Plug In air freshener
Oil PlugIns that change the mood with 2x more adjustability (vs. previous Glade warmer)
Make a splash with our air freshener dispenser with notes of sea salt, island flowers and ocean air
This Glade air freshener fragrance is crafted by master perfumers and infused with Essential Oils
Enjoy up to 50 days of fragrance* with Glade PlugIn Refills (*per refill, on low setting)
body.description: Stock up on these five-pack refills to help make your home the happy place you want it to be, full of long-lasting fragrance. Glade PlugIns Scented Oil Aqua Waves refills come in a convenient five- pack, so you can enjoy your favorite fragrance longer. The refills fit Glade PlugIns Scented Oil diffuser (sold separately) and are easy to insert. Each bottle provides up to 50 days of continuous fragrance*, so you’ll have up to 250 days of fragrance thanks to the five-pack. The fragrance – infused with essential oils – is made without phthalates, parabens or formaldehyde. Create a fresh ocean atmosphere with notes of sea salt, sparkling mandarin, blue lavender, tropical flowers and jasmine. These refills fit our most adjustable warmer ever** (sold separately), that features advanced ceramic heating, optimized airflow, 360° control, and long-lasting consistent fragrance without burning. Simply plug Glade Oil Diffuser in, choose your settings, and enjoy the long-lasting fragrance experience in any room, no matter the size. *per refill, on low setting **vs. previous Glade warmer, on low setting

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use Instructions STEP 1 Remove the cap from the refill and insert it into warmer. Then, plug the warmer upright into an outlet. STEP 2 The PlugIns Scented Oil plug is adjustable for horizontal and vertical outlets. STEP 3 Adjust the level of fragrance to create the mood you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cant go wrong, whole house smells amazing.
reviews.reviewText: Overview:The Glade PlugIns Refills Air Freshener offers a convenient and effective solution for keeping your home and bathroom smelling fresh and inviting. With a range of scents infused with essential oils, this product promises to eliminate odors and create a pleasant ambiance in any space.Key Features:Scent Variety: One of the standout features of the Glade PlugIns Refills is its extensive range of scents. From floral and fruity to warm and cozy, there's a fragrance to suit every preference and mood.Essential Oils: Infused with essential oils, these refills not only mask odors but also add a subtle, natural fragrance to the air. This can contribute to a more relaxing and enjoyable environment in your home.Long-Lasting: Each refill is designed to last for weeks, providing continuous freshness without the need for frequent replacements. This makes it a cost-effective option for maintaining a pleasant-smelling space.Easy to Use: The PlugIns design makes it effortless to replace refills. Simply plug them into any compatible Glade PlugIns warmer, and they'll start dispersing their fragrance immediately.Versatile Use: Whether it's the living room, bathroom, kitchen, or any other area of your home, these refills are versatile enough to be used in any space where you want to combat unwanted odors.Pros:Effective Odor Elimination: Users report that the Glade PlugIns Refills effectively eliminate a wide range of odors, leaving behind a fresh and pleasant scent.Convenience: The ease of use and long-lasting nature of the refills make them a convenient choice for busy households.Affordability: Considering their effectiveness and longevity, these refills offer great value for money compared to other air freshening solutions.Customizable Fragrance Intensity: Some users appreciate the ability to adjust the intensity of the fragrance by choosing between different Glade PlugIns warmers.Cons:Artificial Fragrance: While many enjoy the scent options available, some users may find the fragrances to be too artificial or overpowering.Potential Health Concerns: Some individuals may have sensitivities to synthetic fragrances or essential oils. It's advisable to use these products in well-ventilated areas and discontinue use if any adverse reactions occur.Conclusion:Overall, the Glade PlugIns Refills Air Freshener offers an effective and convenient solution for keeping your home smelling fresh and inviting. With its wide range of scents, long-lasting performance, and ease of use, it's a popular choice for many households. While some may have concerns about artificial fragrances or potential health effects, the majority of users find these refills to be a reliable and affordable way to maintain a pleasant ambiance in their living spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Glade PlugIns Refills in Aqua Waves offer a refreshing and invigorating way to transform your living spaces into a haven of tranquility. With a seamless blend of scented and essential oils, this 5-count pack is a testament to Glade's commitment to quality and long-lasting fragrance.The Aqua Waves scent is an absolute delight. It effortlessly captures the essence of a fresh ocean breeze, creating a serene and calming atmosphere in any room. The fragrance is neither overpowering nor artificial, striking the perfect balance to elevate your home with a subtle yet captivating aroma.The convenience of the PlugIns design cannot be overstated. The easy-to-use refills simply plug into any Glade PlugIns warmer, providing a continuous release of the Aqua Waves fragrance. The modular design allows you to switch between scents effortlessly, tailoring the ambiance to suit your mood or the season.The 3.35 Fl Oz size of each refill is generous, ensuring long-lasting freshness without the need for frequent replacements. The efficiency of the formula means that a little goes a long way, effectively neutralizing odors and infusing your home with the inviting scent of Aqua Waves.What sets this Glade offering apart is the infusion of essential oils into the fragrance. This not only enhances the olfactory experience but also contributes to a more holistic and relaxing environment. The thoughtful combination of scented and essential oils reflects Glade's dedication to creating a multi-sensory experience for users.Whether in the bathroom, living room, or bedroom, the Glade PlugIns Refills in Aqua Waves consistently deliver a burst of freshness. The packaging of the 5-count pack ensures that you have a steady supply of enchanting fragrance, making it a cost-effective and convenient choice for maintaining an inviting home.In conclusion, the Glade PlugIns Refills in Aqua Waves are a standout addition to any home. With a harmonious blend of scented and essential oils, they effortlessly bring the invigorating essence of the ocean into your living spaces. If you're looking to elevate your home with a fragrance that soothes the senses and transforms your environment, this 5-count pack is a must-have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These smell AMAZING
reviews.reviewText: I was at a friend's house and they had one of these in their bathroom. As soon as I got out I said, "Your bathroom smells incredible! I have to know what that scent is!" My friend began digging around under her sink to find these refills and I ordered them on the spot...in her bathroom. The scent is so clean and refreshing. I have them all over my home now and get compliments all the time about how nice our house smells. They last very long and have a decent range. I have these on auto-reorder to make sure I never run out of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells good last a while too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A lot of glade scents are so overwhelming that I unplug after 10 minutes but this one is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The scent is great but it does not last
reviews.reviewText: The scent doesnt last up to 30 days. maybe about 2 weeks/3 weeks max!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I took one out before the photo. Good quality good scent...my fav and affordable. 5 for $11 is a good price. I need more warmers I want to put them around the house. I unplug them when I go to work due to the fire risk but I've had no issues after using these for many years. I have a cat so I need my place to smell good!!!❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Blue Odyssey, but they’ll do.
reviews.reviewText: Smells nice. Nothing can replace Blue Odyssey, though. Bring it back!!!
